articles.description: What do odds say about who will win the Los Angeles Lakers vs. Denver Nuggets NBA Playoffs series and advance to the NBA Finals?
articles.content:
The No. 7 seeded Los Angeles Lakers and No. 1 seeded Denver Nuggets face off in the Western Conference Finals NBA Playoffs series.
What do odds say about who will win the series and advance to the N… [+1972 chars]
